<Product xmlns="http://code.google.com/p/open-zwave/">

  <!-- Configuration Parameters -->
  <CommandClass id="112">
    <Value genre="config" instance="1" index=1" value=0" label=on/off" units="" size=1" min=0" max=1" type="list">
      <Help></Help>
      <Item value="0" label="off">
      <Item value="1" label="on">
    </Value>
    <Value genre="config" instance="1" index=2" value=0" label=on/off" units="" size=1" min=0" max=1" type="byte">

    </Value>
    <Value genre="config" instance="1" index=3" value=0" label=dimming" units="" size=1" min=0" max=1" type="list">
      <Help></Help>
      <Item value="0" label="off">
      <Item value="0" label="dimming">
      <Item value="1" label="on">
    </Value>
  </CommandClass>

  <!-- Association Groups -->
  <CommandClass id="133">
    <Associations num_groups="1">
      <Group index="1" label="Lifeline" max_associations="5" auto="true" />
    </Associations>
  </CommandClass>

</Product>

xml.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<Product>
    <Model>ZM5202</Model>
    <Label lang="en">endpoints for dimming and on/off</Label>

    <CommandClasses>
        <Class>
            <id>0x25</id>             <!-- SWITCH_BINARY -->
        </Class>
        <Class>
            <id>0x59</id>             <!-- ASSOCIATION_GROUP_INFO -->
        </Class>
        <Class>
            <id>0x70</id>             <!-- CONFIGURATION -->
        </Class>
        <Class>
            <id>0x85</id>             <!-- ASSOCIATION -->
        </Class>
        <Class>
            <id>0x8E</id>             <!-- MULTI_INSTANCE_ASSOCIATION -->
        </Class>
    </CommandClasses>

    <Configuration>

        <Parameter>
            <Index>1</Index>
            <Label lang="en">on/off</Label>
            <Type>list</Type>
            <Default>0</Default>
            <Minimum>0</Minimum>
            <Maximum>1</Maximum>
            <Size>1</Size>
            <Item>
                <Value>0</Value>
                <Label lang="en">off</Label>
            </Item>
            <Item>
                <Value>1</Value>
                <Label lang="en">on</Label>
            </Item>
        </Parameter>

        <Parameter>
            <Index>2</Index>
            <Label lang="en">on/off</Label>
            <Type>short</Type>
            <Default>0</Default>
            <Minimum>0</Minimum>
            <Maximum>1</Maximum>
            <Size>1</Size>
        </Parameter>

        <Parameter>
            <Index>3</Index>
            <Label lang="en">dimming</Label>
            <Type>list</Type>
            <Default>0</Default>
            <Minimum>0</Minimum>
            <Maximum>1</Maximum>
            <Size>1</Size>
            <Item>
                <Value>0</Value>
                <Label lang="en">off</Label>
            </Item>
            <Item>
                <Value>0</Value>
                <Label lang="en">dimming</Label>
            </Item>
            <Item>
                <Value>1</Value>
                <Label lang="en">on</Label>
            </Item>
        </Parameter>

    </Configuration>

    <Associations>

        <Group>
            <Index>1</Index>
            <Label lang="en">Lifeline</Label>
            <Maximum>5</Maximum>
            <SetToController>true</SetToController>
        </Group>

    </Associations>

</Product>
